change.changenote: Section 2 (1) BEFORE amended by 2011-13-34, effective June 2, 2011 (Royal Assent).

subsection.subsectiontext: The Environment and Land Use Committee is continued, and consists of a chair and other members of the Executive Council the Lieutenant Governor in Council appoints.

change.changenote: Section 2 (1.1) was added by 2011-13-34, effective June 2, 2011 (Royal Assent).
